sentences.english: Pray for the government to halt its campaign of targeting Christians .
sentences.chinese: 禱告政府會停止以基督徒爲箭靶的活動。

sentences.english: The epidemic was stopped before the annual pilgrimage to Mecca got under way.
sentences.chinese: 這傳染病在一年一度進行麥加朝聖之前停止。

sentences.english: Can we stop using the unrecyclable style of lunch boxes?
sentences.chinese: 我們能否停止使用不可回收的快餐盒？

sentences.english: Yes, since I had it , the attack was stopped.
sentences.chinese: 有用，自從我吃藥後發作就停止了。

sentences.english: You never cease to amaze me, Louie.
sentences.chinese: 你沒有停止給我驚喜，路易。

sentences.english: Devotional service must continue under all circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 無論在任何情況下都不應停止奉愛服務。

sentences.english: North Korea also prohibited reunions between North and South Korean families.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮作爲報復停止了讓朝鮮和韓國失散家庭團聚。

sentences.english: She never stopped trying to get pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 她始終沒有停止過嘗試受孕。

sentences.english: For non-batch programs, stopping the collector forever is not an option.
sentences.chinese: 對於非批處理程序，永久停止收集器並非好的選擇。

sentences.english: Since november ordinarily of it early stoped action.
sentences.chinese: 既然是十一月，他們早就該停止活動了。

sentences.english: It's very easy, in the webhosting business , to stop listening to your clients.
sentences.chinese: 它很容易，在主機空間的業務，停止聽您的客戶。

sentences.english: The first man presses his forearm and the beeping stops.
sentences.chinese: 第一個男人按了一下他的前臂，必必聲就停止了。

sentences.english: those who do not make the corrections within the time limit, shall be ordered to stop construction, and can be imposed with penalty simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 逾期不改正的，責令停止施工，可以並處罰款。
然而，我們不能停止生活。

sentences.english: I’ll never give it up. It helps with the panic attacks.
sentences.chinese: 我不會停止使用它們，它們對驚慌的發作有幫助。

sentences.english: I wish she stop blabbering her boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我希望她停止碟碟不休地談論她男朋友。

definition: to cease/to suspend/to break off/to stop/to discontinue
to cut short/to break off/to discontinue/to interrupt
to withdraw/to abort/to quit/to log out (computing)
